internal.content: --- title: General Questions --- I learned HTML and CSS in high school school making websites for fun and discovered that design is great! However, someone noticed my work at William Hills invited me to interview and I stated my career at my first Agency. Eyal [ee-yaal] means Deer in Hebrew, and for my surname, [Benveniste] from Spanish "Bien veniste" means your arrival was good. It was given to my family by a Spanish king in the medieval. Companies that care about inclusion and diversity with an open culture. Dynamic and open as possible. An ideal group would be an intimate, mission-driven, where the team is open-minded and ready for continual improvements To meet and connect with new people and to be recognized for the value and knowledge I provide. Working to solve a problem with a clear 'why' and goal.

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: General Questions --- I learned HTML and CSS in high school school making websites for fun and discovered that design is great! However, someone noticed my work at William Hills invited me to interview and I stated my career at my first Agency. Eyal [ee-yaal] means Deer in Hebrew, and for my surname, [Benveniste] from Spanish "Bien veniste" means your arrival was good. It was given to my family by a Spanish king in the medieval. Companies that care about inclusion and diversity with an open culture. Dynamic and open as possible. An ideal group would be an intimate, mission-driven, where the team is open-minded and ready for continual improvements To meet and connect with new people and to be recognized for the value and knowledge I provide. Working to solve a problem with a clear 'why' and goal.
